inclusion.criterion: Willingness to replace habitual dairy product intake with the supplied low-calcium soy products
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to abstain from products with high amounts of prebiotic fibers and from products with probiotics (except for the supplied one) starting 1 month prior to study start
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to give blood donation from 1 month before the start of the experiment and during the entire experimental period.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: chlestyramine, acid burn inhibitors or immune suppressive agents (up till 3 months prior)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: High titer serum antibodies against ETEC
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current or previous underlying disease of the GI tract, liver, bile bladder, kidney, thyroid gland
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to milk products or lactose intolerance
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, but no fever and normal blood pressure.
